executable.title: RadiusToMesh
executable.description: This command line perform the insertion of Scalar Fields from a CSV to a VTK File

file.name: CSV
file.label: Input CSV File
file.description: CSV File containing the scalar fields layed out by column

file.name: VTK
file.label: Input VTK File
file.description: VTK File to which will be inserted the scalar fields

integer.name: phiIteration
integer.label: Number of phi iterations
integer.description: Number of phi iterations that was be used to calculate the medial axis

file.name: output
file.label: Output File
file.description: VTK File with scalar fields inserted
